command.sortSelectedCssProperties.title: Sort Selected CSS Properties
command.sortCssPropertiesInFile.title: Sort CSS Properties in File
config.customOrder.description: Custom order list for CSS properties, properties not in the list will be placed at the end in original order.
config.enableConfirm.description: Enable confirm prompt when sorting the entire file.
config.sortOrder.description: Sort order method. 'custom' uses the defined list, 'alphabetical' sorts by property name.
config.unknownPropertyPosition.descripti: Where to place properties not in the custom order list (only applies when sortOrder is 'custom').
